醂醂醂
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

醂字的基本解释

醂
lǎn
〔醂柿〕一种浸渍储藏柿子，使之速熟的方法。亦作“漤（灠）柿”。
桃葅。

醂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǎn］
［《廣韻》盧感切，上感，來。］
浸渍柿子使去除涩味。

醂字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醂； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1284第09
【廣韻】【集韻】?盧感切，音壈。【廣韻】桃葅。　又【集韻】藏?也。

醂字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
醂字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
lǎn
〔醂Persimmon〕 A method of immersing and storing persimmons to make them ripe quickly. Also known as "漤(灠) Persimmon".
Peach blossoms.
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǎn］
["Guangyun" Lu feels sharp, on the sense, come. ]
Dipping persimmons removes astringency.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Zi Department] 　醂; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1284 Page 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Lu Ganqi, Yindi. [Guang Yun] Taohua.　[Jiyun] Zang? Also.
